title: Given x(t), find accel. at a point

content.prompt: The position of a particle moving along the x-axis is x ( t ) = sin ( 2 t ) − cos ( 3 t ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4B13@ for time t≥0. When t=π, the acceleration of the particle is

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
